title: Slick Watchface - with weather
summary: The slickest Android Wear Watch Faces with unique designs and weather support.
developerAddress:
2805/20/11
Pham The Hien St.
Ward 7, District 8
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Pair your android wear watch with your android phone via Bluetooth.2. Install Slick Watchface app from Google Play Store.3. Open Slick Watchface app on phone.4. Select or download the available themes by swiping left and right.5. Change your location (Optional)6. Tap SYNC TO WATCH to push the watch face to your android wear watch.Note: you must select Slick Watchface icon by long-press the main screen of your android wear watch or select it from Android Wear app in order to make the Watch faces display on your screen.----------------------------------------------Supported devices:- Samsung Gear Live- LG G Watch- Moto 360- Zen Watch (untested)(Basically any round and square Android Wear watches)- Android Phone running Android OS 4.3 and newer ----------------------------------------------FAQ 1. The Slick Watchface app keeps showing "Device Disconnected"Please make sure you have turned on Bluetooth connection and pair your Android phone with your Android Wear watch by using Android Wear app on the Google Play Store. 2. I can't download the themesSlick Watchface themes are stored on our server, therefore you need an Internet connection to be able to download them, we suggest you to use good connection like Wi-Fi.3. Thank you! ☺
descriptionHTML:
Most themes are FREE, get them quick!

► RICH FEATURES
• Weather condition watch faces.
• Custom location.
• Weather refresh interval.
• 24-hour digital clock support
• Screen awake time setting (developing)
• Build-in launcher (developing)



► THEME STORE
• Download free and premium watch faces.

HOW TO USE:
1. Pair your android wear watch with your android phone via Bluetooth.
2. Install Slick Watchface app from Google Play Store.
3. Open Slick Watchface app on phone.
4. Select or download the available themes by swiping left and right.
5. Change your location (Optional)
6. Tap SYNC TO WATCH to push the watch face to your android wear watch.

Note: you must select Slick Watchface icon by long-press the main screen of your android wear watch or select it from Android Wear app in order to make the Watch faces display on your screen.

----------------------------------------------

Supported devices:
- Samsung Gear Live
- LG G Watch
- Moto 360
- Zen Watch (untested)
(Basically any round and square Android Wear watches)
- Android Phone running Android OS 4.3 and newer

----------------------------------------------

FAQ
1. The Slick Watchface app keeps showing "Device Disconnected"
Please make sure you have turned on Bluetooth connection and pair your Android phone with your Android Wear watch by using Android Wear app on the Google Play Store.

2. I can't download the themes
Slick Watchface themes are stored on our server, therefore you need an Internet connection to be able to download them, we suggest you to use good connection like Wi-Fi.

3. Synchronization takes too long
Please keep your Android phone and your Android wear watch close enough (within 1 meter). Some of our themes contain many images (Window theme), therefore it will take about less than a minute to finish the synchronization.

4. How can I get more themes?
We update new theme frequently to the Watch face Store, you can download free for pay for premium watch faces. The Store button is located at the top-right corner of the app.

----------------------------------------------

Please send your feedback to our support email at: support@suncod.com before giving bad rating on Google Play Store, we will try to solve your problems as soon as possible. Thank you! ☺
comments: Great,  creative watch faces but won't sync anymore with my moto 360. None of them will work. Some (though not all) worked before,  but suddenly,  nothing.  I think the app got an update,  and that's why it's not working...
Love the faces Really like all the watch faces so far. Great job dev. Color changing goat....yes please
It's great but very limited selection of free watchfaces, I would prefer more themed digital faces like the current winter ones.
Love it Need more faces thou
Excellent I like simple and original
recentChanges: - New Redeem feature for paid themes, post/share Slick Watchface app on your Facebook or Twitter to get a free Redeem Code. Take a screenshot of your post and email to us at: support@suncod.com
